title: burningpack
description:
i know that today there are many excellent writing tools for cd and
dvd media. but many of those tools with excellent burning engines and / 
or other advantages are rather unknown. i collected some of these tools,
most of them latest versions.
my favourites are:
- dvdmate
- acard ha! burner
- prassi ONES (which is rockstable and has many features but doesn&#039;t need
  lots of space (1,7 MB!) 
then there is a classic one, discjuggler, which is more than semi-professional.
read the manual for the many many settings to get the best of your burning
tasks.

i would like to have added NTI and B&#039;s recorder, but i don&#039;t have any new
versions of them, besides of that NTI is quite bloated. but if you decide
to install bloatware forget nero and search NTI. well, &#039;nuff said :D  

contains:

acard	
alcohol	
blindwrite	
cdrwin40f_unicode	
copytodvd_vso.40460	
dvdmate	
feurio	
ghosthunter freeware	
padus discjuggler.NET	
prassi ONES incl. update
